name: Adam Warlock - Cosmic Alliance
effect: Acts as a level 3 Fighting attack. Each Front Line teammate may make 1 additional attack.

name: Adam Warlock - Energy Barrage
effect: Acts as a level 7 Energy attack.

name: Adam Warlock - Soul Gem
effect: Only Adam Warlock and target opponent may attack or defend this battle.

name: Any Character - Arkham Asylum
effect:
Play when opponent's Hero is KO'd. Reserve must skip a battle before entering.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - Deal with the Devil
effect:
Opponent must discard top 2 cards from Draw Pile into Dead Pile.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - Deal with the Devil
effect:
Opponent must discard top 2 cards from Draw Pile into Dead Pile.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - Justice League of America
effect:
Attack made on Front Line Character is now made on any other Front Line character.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - The Batcave
effect:
You may look at top 3 cards in opponent's Draw Pile.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - The Fortress of Solitude
effect:
Play on your turn to concede battle. All Mission cards Ventured this battle return to piles they were Ventured from. This card may be Placed.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - Urban Hunters
effect:
Any Front Line Character may make 1 attack after opponent has conceded the battle. Opponent may defend.
One per deck.

name: Any Hero - Alien Symbiote
effect: Symbiotic bonding! Remove 1 hit from the Permanent Record of any hero.

name: Any Hero - Confusion
effect:
Avoids all attacks from 1 Teamwork card, or target hero must discard 1 Placed Teamwork card.
One per deck.

name: Any Hero - Death from Above
effect:
Sauron swoops in and makes a level 4 Fighting attack! Any hero may make 1 additional attack.
One per deck.

name: Any Hero - Gamma Terror
effect:
Abomination rampages! Acts as a level 7 Strength attack.
One per deck.

name: Any Hero - God of Mischief
effect:
Loki's Evil Magic! Opponent -3 to venture total for this battle.
One per deck.

name: Any Hero - Guardian Angel
effect:
Archangel gives warning. Any hero may avoid 1 attack.
One per deck.

name: Any Hero - Savage Land
effect:
On your turn, play before opponent concedes. Opponent may not concede battle. This card may be Placed.
One per deck.

name: Any Hero - Unlucky at Love
effect:
Spurned by the Black Cat! Any 1 of opponent's heroes is -2 to defense for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Any Hero - Web-Headed Wizard
effect:
Immediately exchange this card for any 1 card in Dead Pile.
One per deck.

name: Any Mission - Hideout Discovered
effect: Discard all Placed Teamwork Universe cards. No Teamwork Universe cards may be played this battle.

Daily Bugle: Hideout Discovered

Intense investigation revealed a secret cache of gold, jewels, and technology, leaving only the question, "Who will feel the pain of this sting?"

name: Assault on Onslaught - Do or Die
effect: Before discarding, take one card from your hand and put it on the bottom of the Draw Pile.

Daily Bugle: Do or Die

As a final do-or-die strategy, the heroes decided to save the beast for last...

name: Assault on Onslaught - Fighting Spirit Lives
effect: All Special cards in your hand may be played by any Hero, for remainder of battle.

Daily Bugle: Fighting Spirit Lives

As heroes fell by the wayside, their spirit was carried forward for those that remained...

name: Assault on Onslaught - Helping Hands
effect: Draw two cards after the Discard Phase. Do not discard if duplicates.

Daily Bugle: Helping Hands

From out of nowhere, the heroes received assistance in their desperate time of need...

name: Assault on Onslaught - On the Move
effect: No Intellect Power cards may be played this battle. Affected Power cards are not discarded.

Daily Bugle: On the Move

With no time to think, the heroes charged into battle, as the enemy forces were on the move...

name: Assault on Onslaught - Spy Discovered
effect: After placing, reveal any 4 cards in your hand to your opponent.

Daily Bugle: Spy Discovered

The recent acquisition of the enemy's plans proved a temporary victory when a spy was discovered...

name: Assault on Onslaught 1 of 7
effect:
#1: Unity in Chaos (Professor X)
Onslaught stands revealed! Gather the combined might of the Avengers and the X-Men and prepare for the pandemonium that is to come.

#2: Incredible Forces (Hulk)
The most powerful physical force on the planet is at the command of Onslaught! Triumph now, or face ultimate devastation!

#3: Child of the Future (Franklin Richards)
The nightmare of darkness grows as Franklin Richards becomes one with Onslaught. Cast aside prejudice and unite with your enemies in an effort to achieve a greater good.

#4: Display of Power (Apocalypse,Cable)
The hellicarrier is destroyed, and Manhattan is in ruins as Onslaught and his minions take the east coast. Muster your power and save the denizens of New York.

#5: Sphere of Influence (Bastion)
Onslaught's army of sentinels marches unopposed across the Earth. Race against the clock in order to stop Onslaught's forces before the human resistance uses its nuclear solution.

#6: Desperate Reunion (Rogue,Magneto)
Divide and conquer, for sacrifice may be your only chance. Struggle to remove a crucial piece of Onslaught with the hope that it will reverse the process that created him!

#7: Ground Zero (Onslaught)
Face the dual threat of Onslaught and a devastating nuclear strike and bring the conflict to an end. Or a new beginning?

effect:

name: Avenger's ID Card
effect: Teammate may use Tactic: Double Shot cards, with normal contribution, to avoid any attack.

name: Backlash, Future
effect: May play any Backlash Special cards.

name: Batman Avenger
effect: Batman's MultiPower cards are +1 vs. any Character with a Villain code.

name: Batman Detective
effect: Batman may play Comm. Gordon and G.C.P.D. "Sting Operation" Special.

name: Beyonder
effect: May play any Special cards.

name: Black Cat
effect: Hillshire Farms Promo

name: Black King
effect: May play any Hellfire Club Special cards.

name: Captain Universe
effect: +1 to any Special card that contains an icon. May not be combined with a "One Per Deck" Special. Bonus counts toward damage and venture total.

name: Carnage - Combat Chaos
effect: Opponent's Energy Power cards do not count in the Venture total for this battle.

name: Catwoman Whiplash
effect: Catwoman's Fighting Power cards are +1 vs. any Character with a Hero code.

name: Colossus - Siberian Strength
effect:
Opponent must discard 3 cards from Hand. Cards chosen by Opponent.
One per deck.

name: Comm. James Gordon
effect: Comm. Gordon and G.C.P.D. are +2 to Venture Total each battle.

name: Crystal
effect: May play any Inhumans Special cards.

name: Doctor Octopus - Killer Crush
effect: Acts as a level 6 Strength attack. Cannot be defended by a card with an Energy icon.

name: Doppelganger
effect: Doppelganger may play any Spider-Man Specials.

name: Dr. Octopus
effect: Hillshire Farms Promo

name: Gambit - Full House
effect: Acts as a level 8 Any-Power attack. Does not count toward Spectrum KO.

name: Hobgoblin
effect: Hillshire Farms Promo

name: Hobgoblin - Frightening Visage
effect: Target hero must discard 1 Placed Universe card of Hobgoblin's choice.

name: Holocaust - Apocalyptic Minion
effect: Move all hits from Holocaust's Hits from Current Battle into Permanent Record. Affects Venture Total.

name: Holocaust - Consume Lifeforce
effect: Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. If successful, remove 1 hit from Holocaust's Permanent Record.

name: Holocaust - Death Cannon
effect:
Acts as a level 8 Energy, Strength, Fighting, or Intellect attack.
One per deck.

name: Holocaust - Devastate
effect:
All cards currently in opponent's Dead Pile are removed from game.
One per deck.

name: Holocaust - Impervious Crystal
effect: Avoid 1 attack.

name: Holocaust - Otherworldly Evil
effect: Negate the effect of any 1 Special card played by opponent.

name: Image Inducer
effect: Teammate may discard 2 cards from top of Draw Pile to Dead Pile to move any attack made on any Front Line Character onto Character with Image Inducer. Character may defend.

name: Marrow - Skeletal Plates
effect: Marrow or teammate may avoid 1 attack of 4 or less. Marrow may draw 1 card from the top of the Draw Pile. Discard duplicates.

name: Mysterio
effect: Hillshire Farms Promo

name: Mysterio - Misdirection
effect: Avoid 1 Energy attack.

name: Nightcrawler - Blindside
effect:
Acts as a level 3 Strength attack. May make 2 additional attacks at +2. Bonus not applied to damage, or Venture Total.
One per deck.

name: Onslaught - Baptism by Fire
effect:
Remove 1 hit from the Permanent Record of Onslaught or teammate for every card in the Defeated Missions Pile.
One per deck.

name: Onslaught - Dark Enigma
effect:
Acts as a level 7 Intellect attack. If successful, opponent must move 1 Mission card from the Completed Missions Pile to the Reserve Missions Pile.
One per deck.

name: Onslaught - Merciless Conqueror
effect: KO any one of Onslaught's teammates. All of teammate's Hits from Current Battle are discarded and do not get added to Venture Total for this battle.

name: Onslaught - Mutant Gestalt
effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. If successful, acts as a level 1 Energy or Strength Hit.

name: Onslaught - Psychic Absorption
effect: Target opponent may not play Specials for remainder of battle.

name: Onslaught - Raw Power
effect: Acts as a level 7 Fighting attack.

name: Post - Gather Info
effect: Move all of target opponent's Hits from Permanent Record into Hits from Current Battle. Affects Venture total.

name: Post - Herald of Onslaught
effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy, Strength, Fighting, or Intellect attack. May make 1 additional attack.

name: Post - Lethal Tester
effect: Post may attack any Front Line teammate using 1 of opponent's Placed cards. Teammate may defend.

name: Post - Obfuscate
effect: Post is not affected by Event cards for remainder of game.

name: Post - Protective Plates
effect:
Avoid 1 attack. Post may not be attacked for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Post - Strategic Assault
effect:
Sort through opponent's Draw Pile. Choose any 1 card and remove it from game. Reshuffle Draw Pile.
One per deck.

name: Power A5 (Black Cat)
effect:
Does not count for Spectrum KO.
One per deck.

name: Professor X - Shi'ar Battle Armor
effect: For remainder of battle, Professor X's Fighting and Strength actions are +2. Energy actions are -2.

name: Ra'S Al Ghul Sword Master
effect: Basic Universe cards are an additional +1 when used by Ra's Al Ghul.

name: Rhino
effect: Hillshire Farms Promo

name: Rhino - Stampede
effect: Rhino may combine Strength Power cards level 1 thru 4 for a single attack. May be blocked as a whole or in parts.

name: Rogue - Nigh Invulnerable
effect:
For remainder of game, cards on Rogue's Hits to Current Battle with Fighting or Strength icons do not count towards Opponent's Venture Total.
One per deck.

name: Scarlet Spider
effect: Hillshire Farms Promo

name: Scarlet Spider - Scarlet Savior
effect: Teammate may avoid 1 attack.

name: Shadowcat - Ninja Adept
effect: Acts as a level 6 Any-Power card. May be used to attack or defend. May not be combined with Universe cards.

name: Silver Sable
effect: Hillshire Farms Promo

name: Spawn - Finite Power
effect:
Play on Target Character as an attack. For remainder of battle, Target Character may not attack unless Opponent also discards 2 cards per attack. Cards may be Placed or in Hand.
One per deck.

name: Spider-man
effect: Hillshire Farms Promo

name: Spider-Man - Over the Edge
effect: Acts as a level 4 Fighting attack. May combine with 1 Strength card for a single attack.

name: Storm - Gathering Winds
effect:
Sort through Power Pack card by card. Put the first 3 cards with Energy icons in Hand. May keep duplicates. Reshuffle Power Pack.
One per deck.

name: Team OverPower
effect:
Chars: Any tournament legal team using normal deck-building rules.

Ability: Team OverPower may Place Any-Character Specials and Aspects to HomeBase, using normal placing rules. Only one of each card may be Placed. Any-Character Specials may be played by Any Character on team.

name: Team X
effect: May play any non-One-Per-Deck Wolverine, Sabretooth, or Maverick Special cards.

name: Teamwork A6 AA (Captain America,Spider-Man,Wolverine)
effect:
+0A and +0A
OR
+0A and +0A

name: Two-Face Crimeboss
effect: Two-Face may play "Flip of the Coin" from Reserve.

name: Venom
effect: Hillshire Farms Promo

name: Venom - Lethal Protector
effect: Attack made on teammate is now made on Venom, who may defend it.

name: Voodoo, Daemonite
effect: May play any Voodoo Special cards.

name: Wolverine - Tracking Senses
effect: Acts as a level 5 Intellect attack. If successful, Wolverine may sort through Draw Pile, select any Aspect card and play it immediately. Reshuffle Draw Pile.

name: Wolverine, Golden Age
effect: May play any Wolverine Special cards.
